title: Abyssal needle

Abyssal needle

Item ID26813

The abyssal needle is an item that can be obtained from the Rewards Guardian after completing a round of Guardians of the Rift.

Players with level 56 Crafting and 85 Runecraft(not boostable) can use the needle to stitch together the small, medium, large, and giant pouches into a colossal pouch, which stores 40 rune, pure, or daeyalt essence. Upon crafting the colossal pouch, the abyssal needle is consumed.

When inspected, it will result in a chatbox message saying "The needle looks like it could handle the strange fabric that essence pouches are made of. Its magic might even expand their essence holding capabilities."

Should the player lose their colossal pouch or abyssal needle, they must use a regular needle on the Rewards Guardian to obtain another abyssal needle. When this occurs, the chatbox message will state "You place the needle inside the rift. You feel something strange touch your hands... You quickly pull your hands back and find that the needle has warped into an abyssal needle." After this, they must reacquire the pouches and use the needle on the pouches again.

[[File:Abyssal needle detail.png|left|100px]]
The '''abyssal needle''' is an item that can be obtained from the [[Rewards Guardian]] after completing a round of [[Guardians of the Rift]].

Players with level 56 [[Crafting]] and 85 [[Runecraft]]{{Boostable|no}} can use the needle to stitch together the [[Small pouch|small]], [[Medium pouch|medium]], [[Large pouch|large]], and [[giant pouch]]es into a [[colossal pouch]], which stores 40 [[rune essence|rune]], [[pure essence|pure]], or [[daeyalt essence]]. Upon crafting the colossal pouch, the abyssal needle is consumed.

When inspected, it will result in a chatbox message saying "''The needle looks like it could handle the strange fabric that essence pouches are made of. Its magic might even expand their essence holding capabilities.''"

Should the player lose their colossal pouch or abyssal needle, they must use a regular [[needle]] on the Rewards Guardian to obtain another abyssal needle. When this occurs, the chatbox message will state "''You place the needle inside the rift. You feel something strange touch your hands... You quickly pull your hands back and find that the needle has warped into an abyssal needle.''" After this, they must reacquire the pouches and use the needle on the pouches again.
